Structs/Promise.html#/s:7Futures7Promise.name: fulfill(_:)
Structs/Promise.html#/s:7Futures7Promise.abstract: Fullfills the promise, setting a value to this promise’s Future

Structs/Promise.html#/s:7Futures7Promise.name: reject(_:)
Structs/Promise.html#/s:7Futures7Promise.abstract: Rejects the promise, setting an error to this promise’s Future

Structs/Promise.html#/s:7Futures7Promise.name: resolve(_:)
Structs/Promise.html#/s:7Futures7Promise.abstract: Resolves the promise, setting either a value or an error to this promise’s Future

Structs/Promise.html.name: Promise
Structs/Promise.html.abstract: A promise to provide a result later.

Structs/FutureProvider.html.name: FutureProvider
Structs/FutureProvider.html.abstract: A typed container in which to provide specialized futures.

Protocols/FutureSupport.html.name: FutureSupport
Protocols/FutureSupport.html.abstract: A protocol that can be used to add support for futures to a type of your choice.

Functions.html#/s:7Futures7promiseAA6Fut.name: promise(_:on:_:)
Functions.html#/s:7Futures7promiseAA6Fut.abstract: Shorthand for creating a new Future<T>, in an asynchronous fashion.

Extensions/DispatchQueue.html#/s:So13Dis.name: futures
Extensions/DispatchQueue.html#/s:So13Dis.abstract: The default queue, on which futures are observed and executed on.

Enums/FutureValue.html#/s:7Futures11Futu.name: init(_:)
Enums/FutureValue.html#/s:7Futures11Futu.abstract: Creates a new FutureValue<T>, capturing the return value, or throw error of a function.

Enums/FutureValue.html#/s:7Futures11Futu.name: unwrap()
Enums/FutureValue.html#/s:7Futures11Futu.abstract: Returns the a fulfilled value, or throws a rejection error

Enums/FutureValue.html.name: FutureValue
Enums/FutureValue.html.abstract: Value of a future, being either rejected with an error or fulfilled with a value.

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC4.name: then(on:callback:)
Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC4.abstract: When the current Future is fulfilled, run the provided callback returning a new Future<T>.

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC1.name: thenIfRejected(on:callback:)
Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC1.abstract: When the current Future is rejected, run the provided callback reurning a new Future<T>.

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC3.name: map(on:callback:)
Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC3.abstract: When the current Future is fulfilled, run the provided callback returning a fulfilled value of the

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC1.name: mapIfRejected(on:callback:)
Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC1.abstract: When the current Future is rejected, run the provided callback returning a fulfilled value of the

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC3.name: and(_:on:)
Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC3.abstract: Returns a new Future, that resolves when this and the provided future both are resolved.

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC4.name: fold(_:on:with:)
Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC4.abstract: Returns a new Future<T> that fires only when this Future<T> and all provided Future<U>s complete.

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC6.name: reduce(_:on:initialResult:nextPartialResult:)
Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC6.abstract: Returns a new Future<T> that fires only when all the provided Future<U>s have been resolved.

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC5.name: defer(on:callback:)
Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC5.abstract: Returns a new Future<T> that will resolve with result of this Future after the provided Future<Void>

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC1.name: whenFulfilled(on:callback:)
Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC1.abstract: Adds a FutureObserver<T> to this Future<T>, that is called when the future is fulfilled.

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC1.name: whenRejected(on:callback:)
Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC1.abstract: Adds a FutureObserver<T> to this Future<T>, that is called when the future is rejected.

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC1.name: whenResolved(on:callback:)
Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC1.abstract: Adds a FutureObserver<T> to this Future<T>, that is called when the future is resolved.

Classes/FutureObserver.html#/s:7Futures1.name: remove()
Classes/FutureObserver.html#/s:7Futures1.abstract: Removes the observer from its associated future. The observer will not be invoked

Classes/FutureObserver.html.abstract: Used to keep track of observers, in order to supply the ability to

Classes/Future.html.name: Future
Classes/Future.html.abstract: Container for a result that will be provided later.
